nodes.text: Tey-Zuka was a Super tactical droid who served the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

Shortly after Darth Maul's escape from the Spire Prison in 20 BBY, Tey-Zuka was stationed onboard a Providence-class carrier/destroyer with the cyborg General Grievous. The pair took the cruiser to the moon Zanbar, where the Separatists attacked a Shadow Collective rendezvousing there with Maul. Tey-Zuka remained on the ship during the battle, in which both sides sustained heavy casualties and Maul managed to escape.

In the aftermath of the battle of Zanbar, General Grievous and Tey-Zuka were able to pursue Maul and his followers to the planet Ord Mantell where they again attacked the Shadow Collective. During the battle, Maul managed to board the Providence-class dreadnought he and Grievous were on board, striking down Tey-Zuka and the rest of the Battle droids on the bridge before capturing Grievous.
